description:
All the monsters from Hope's Peak Academy wear a bear mask... Only a true Tikiman can overcome the trial that awaits!

The Danganronpa Pack includes:
• New Area: Hope's Peak Academy (3 stages)
• New Tower: Mana
• New Enemies (4 types)
• New Danganronpa-themed Masks
name: PixelJunk™ Monsters 2 Danganronpa Pack
